name: Minimally Corpse-Based Parkour Game
description: Minimally Corpse Based Parkour Game is a game where you  are tasked with completing levels seemingly completely impossible. To get the job done, you must die and use your corpse as a platform. However, you can't die too much. That would be unrealistic. So, there's a limit on how many times you can die in the process of completing a level.
